title: Securing Critical Infrastructure for Energy Provider
challenge: Northeast Energy Corporation faced growing cybersecurity threats targeting their operational technology (OT) systems. They needed to secure legacy SCADA systems while maintaining 24/7 operational reliability for 5 million customers.
solution: Cygint deployed our specialized OT security platform with passive monitoring capabilities. We created custom security controls for their unique industrial systems and implemented an air-gapped security operations center.
results: Detected and prevented a potential ransomware attack that targeted industrial control systems. Reduced security incidents by 76% in the first year. Achieved regulatory compliance with zero operational disruptions.

title: Healthcare Provider Secures Patient Data and Medical Devices
challenge: MediCare Systems struggled with securing a complex network of medical IoT devices across 50+ healthcare facilities. They needed visibility into thousands of connected medical devices while ensuring HIPAA compliance and minimal disruption to patient care.
solution: Cygint deployed its attack surface management platform with specialized healthcare configurations. We integrated with their existing security tools and implemented a non-intrusive scanning protocol safe for medical devices.
results: Discovered 340+ previously unknown connected devices. Implemented security controls that reduced data breach risk by 68%. Automated compliance reporting saved 20+ hours of staff time weekly.
